info.title: Cloudmersive Security
info.description: The security APIs help you detect and block security threats.

post.summary: Automatically detect threats in an input string
post.description: Auto-detects a wide range of threat types in input string, including Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), SQL Injection (SQLI), XML External Entitites (XXE), Server-side Request Forgeries (SSRF), and JSON Insecure Deserialization (JID).

post.summary: Detect Insecure Deserialization JSON (JID) attacks in a string
post.description: Detects Insecure Deserialization JSON (JID) attacks from text input.

post.summary: Check text input for SQL Injection (SQLI) attacks
post.description: Detects SQL Injection (SQLI) attacks from text input.

post.summary: Protect text input from Cross-Site-Scripting (XSS) attacks through normalization
post.description: Detects and removes XSS (Cross-Site-Scripting) attacks from text input through normalization.  Returns the normalized result, as well as information on whether the original input contained an XSS risk.

post.summary: Protect text input from XML External Entity (XXE) attacks
post.description: Detects XXE (XML External Entity) attacks from XML text input.

post.summary: Check a URL for Server-side Request Forgery (SSRF) threats
post.description: Checks if an input URL is at risk of being an SSRF (Server-side request forgery) threat or attack.

post.summary: Check if IP address is a known threat
post.description: Check if the input IP address is a known threat IP address.  Checks against known bad IPs, botnets, compromised servers, and other lists of threats.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be
parameters.x-ms-summary: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be

post.summary: Check if IP address is a Bot client threat
post.description: Check if the input IP address is a Bot, robot, or otherwise a non-user entity.  Leverages real-time signals to check against known high-probability bots..

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be
parameters.x-ms-summary: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be

post.summary: Check if IP address is a Tor node server
post.description: Check if the input IP address is a Tor exit node server.  Tor servers are a type of privacy-preserving technology that can hide the original IP address who makes a request.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be
parameters.x-ms-summary: IP address to check, e.g. "55.55.55.55".  The input is a string so be

StringAutomaticThreatDetection.description: Result of performing an Insecure Deserialization JSON protection operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

ContainedJsonInsecureDeserializationAtta.description: True if the input contained Insecure Deserialization JSON, false otherwise

ContainedXssThreat.description: True if the input contained XSS attack, false otherwise

ContainedXxeThreat.description: True if the input contained XXE attack, false otherwise

ContainedSqlInjectionThreat.description: True if the input contained SQL Injection attack, false otherwise

ContainedSsrfThreat.description: True if the input contained an Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) URL attack, false otherwise

IsXML.description: True if the input string is XML, false otherwise

IsJSON.description: True if the input string is JSON, false otherwise

IsURL.description: True if the input string is a URL, false otherwise

StringInsecureDeserializationJsonDetecti.description: Result of performing an Insecure Deserialization JSON protection operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

ContainedJsonInsecureDeserializationAtta.description: True if the input contained Insecure Deserialization JSON, false otherwise

StringSqlInjectionDetectionResult.description: Result of performing an SQL Injection protection operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

ContainedSqlInjectionAttack.description: True if the input contained SQL Injection attacks, false otherwise

StringXssProtectionResult.description: Result of performing an XSS protection operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

ContainedXss.description: True if the input contained XSS scripting, false otherwise

NormalizedResult.description: Normalized string result, with XSS removed

StringXxeDetectionResult.description: Result of performing an XXE threat detection operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

ContainedXxe.description: True if the input contained XXE threats, false otherwise

UrlSsrfThreatDetectionRequestFull.description: Request to determine if a URL is an SSRF threat check

BlockedDomains.description: Top level domains that you do not want to allow access to, e.g. mydomain.com - will block all subdomains as well

UrlSsrfThreatDetectionResponseFull.description: Result of checking a URL for SSRF threats

CleanURL.description: True if the URL is clean, false if it is at risk of containing an SSRF threat or attack

ThreatLevel.description: Threat level of the URL; possible values are High, Medium, Low and None

IPThreatDetectionResponse.description: Result of performing a IP threat check on an IP address

IsThreat.description: True if the input IP address is a threat, false otherwise

ThreatType.description: Specifies the type of IP threat; possible values include Blocklist, Botnet, WebBot

ThreatDetectionBotCheckResponse.description: Result of performing a Bot check on an IP address

IsBot.description: True if the input IP address is a Bot or Robot, false otherwise

ThreatDetectionTorNodeResponse.description: Result of performing a Tor node check on an IP address

IsTorNode.description: True if the input IP address is a Tor exit node, false otherwise
